Function.Name: IsNull
Function.Description: Returns true if the specified row value is equal to null or DBNull.Value.

Function.Name: NextIsNull
Function.Description: Returns true if the next row value is equal to null or DBNull.Value. If the next row does not exist then the function returns true.

Function.Name: PreviousIsNull
Function.Description: Returns true if the previous row value is equal to null or DBNull.Value. If the previous row does not exist then the function returns true.
Function.ArgumentDescription: A name of the Data Column.

Function.Name: Previous
Function.Description: Returns a value of the specified field in the previous entry. If the previous row does not exist then the function returns null.
Function.ReturnDescription: A value of the specified field in the previous entry.
Function.ArgumentDescription: A name of the Data Column.

Function.Name: Next
Function.Description: Returns a value of the specified field in the previous entry. If the next row does not exist then the function returns null.
Function.ReturnDescription: A value of the specified field in the previous entry.
Function.ArgumentDescription: A name of the Data Column.
